## TileKey.parentMortonCode() method

Computes the Morton code of the parent tile key of the given Morton code.

Note: The parent key of the root key is the root key itself.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static parentMortonCode(mortonCode: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mortonCode | number | A Morton code, for example, obtained from \[\[mortonCode\]\]. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The Morton code of the parent tile.
